history.proof: intros x a b H1 H2. inversion H1; subst. - qsimpl use: Lt_tl. qsimpl use: Lt_tl. sauto lq: on rew: off depth: 3. - qsimpl use: Lt_tl. qsimpl use: Lt_tl. sauto lq: on depth: 3. - sauto lq: on rew: off depth: 3.

ctx: intros x a b H1 H2.
intros x a b H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: Unable to find an instance for the variable a.

ctx: intros x a b H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: In environment H : forall (A : Set) (leA : A -> A -> Prop) (a : A) (x y : list A), Ltl A leA x y -> Ltl A leA (a :: x) (a :: y) A : Set leA : A -> A -> Prop x : List a, b : A H1 : Descl (x ++ Cons a Nil) H2 : ltl (x ++ Cons a Nil) (Cons b Nil) H0 : Nil = x ++ Cons a Nil Unable to unify "ltl (x ++ Cons a Nil) (Cons b Nil)" with "ltl x (Cons b Nil)".

ctx: intros x a b H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

ctx: intros x a b H1 H2.
intros x a b H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: Unable to find an instance for the variable a.

ctx: intros x a b H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: In environment H : forall (A : Set) (leA : A -> A -> Prop) (a : A) (x y : list A), Ltl A leA x y -> Ltl A leA (a :: x) (a :: y) A : Set leA : A -> A -> Prop x : List a, b : A H1 : Descl (x ++ Cons a Nil) H2 : ltl (x ++ Cons a Nil) (Cons b Nil) x0 : A H0 : Cons x0 Nil = x ++ Cons a Nil Unable to unify "ltl (x ++ Cons a Nil) (Cons b Nil)" with "ltl x (Cons b Nil)".

original: intros x a b H1 H2. inversion H1; subst. - intros H3 H4. apply Lt_tl in H2. apply H2. - intros H3 H4. apply Lt_tl in H2. apply H2.
